jobDescription: Senior Data Scientist  This is a very unique Data Science opportunity! In this role your time would be split as follows: 2 quarters - teaching at our data science bootcamp in SF, 1 quarter - working on business projects, 1 quarter - you'd get paid to work on data science passion projects of your choice (write a book, work on research, take a consulting assignment - your choice)! The latter 2 quarters are REMOTE work.  We are a highly successful data science boot-camp with locations in NYC, Chicago, Seattle and San Francisco and we're looking for dynamic Data Scientists with a passion for teaching. Top Reasons to Work with Us
